infos.value: Meanwhile, at Leonis Castle where Machérie is being held captive—
Damn... Where could they be keeping her?
Heh heh heh. I bet you'll be surprised when you see me coming to the rescue.
Hey, Machérie. I've come to save you.
Could it be...my beloved Lord Camillo...!? Why are you here!?
It's only natural, my sweet. You—and only you—are the light of my life.
This cannot be, Lord Camillo. Please, you must forget about me.
B-but why? The love we share is so pure...!
I am a prisoner. Please, you must escape, quickly! Before they—
Wh-wh-what's your problem!? How long have you been standing there!?
What's the matter? Is your little play-acting over already?
What a helpless fellow. Hold still, I'll put your mind at peace. Permanently.
J-just who the hell do you think you are?
Elsirelle. From right here in Leonis.
...Which division?
Ah... I-I don't belong to one.
Huh? There's no way you're unaffiliated!
I'm not one for crowds.
You're a suspicious one.
That would be you. Now give me your name.
Camillo.
From whence do you hail?
I...I don't belong to any nation.
Stop messing around! Everyone belongs to one country or another!
But you don't belong to any division, either?
That's completely unrelated.
Tsk... Fine. I'll talk, so go ahead and lower your blade.
Hmph, so I'm supposed to believe you renounced your country after falling head over heels for Princess Machérie?
...What an exceptional fool.
Sh-shut up!
But I don't quite understand. You say Hourne has divided into two, and one of those sides is occupying Leonis Castle...
But the people in there appear to be warrior monks of the Church of the Crystal.
...What is it with you? How do you not know anything?
Were you not in the castle up until now?
I-I was there...
So what were you doing?
I-I wasn't doing anything.
...Seriously, are you really from Leonis?
Y-yes. Everything I've said is the truth.
You were sleeping, weren't you.
...*Gulp*
I knew it. You've been sleeping this whole time?
I prefer to call it "meditating."
Meditating so hard your consciousness just happened to fade away...?
...You could interpret it like that, yes.
Oh great... It looks like your loud mouth got us found!
You're saying it's my fault!?
...No other choice but to fight back to back, aye?
...Fine.
